resources.string: The Central Park is one of the main green spaces in Cluj-Napoca, founded in 1827. Full of green, a lake and a casino, the park is one of the main attractions of the city. Over spring and summer, the lake is populated with swans and ducks, which are a delight for children. By the lake, there is also the Centre of Urban Culture, a historic monument that played the role of casino, museum, school of fine arts and restaurant over the years. In most recent years, either in the Casino\'s building or the park alleys, cultural and recreational events play a big role. Either if you want to participate at a dance course, ride the bike, attend the UNTOLD Festival or just sit on a bench, the park always manages to bring you into a relaxing state.

Is a botanical garden located in the south part of the city and was founded in 1872. Bedides being a tourist destination, the garden also serves as a teaching and research center as part of the Babeș-Bolyai University. The garden is over 14 hectares in area, with over 10,000 plants from throughout the world. The main attractions are the Japanese Garden (a garden in Japanese style, with a brook and a Japanese-style house) and the Roman Garden with archeological remains from the Roman colony of Napoca.
Monday to Sunday from 8 AM to 8 PM

This is the place to go to if you want to admire one of the best panoramas of the city and the surrounding hills, rivers and even mountains. The fortress was built in the 18th century, in order to ensure the control of the city, more than for defensive purposes, occasionally serving as a prison.

Mostly known by its old name, the Babeș Park is one of the biggest parks of Cluj-Napoca and at the same time it is also the campus of the Faculty of Physical Education and Sport within UBB. Established in 1931, the park wss designed to be the place of sports training to university students, but also an oasis of tranquillity and balance, accessible to everyone. The park combines authentic natural spaces with perimeters for sports activities.
Monday to Sunday from 6 AM to 11 PM

Iulius Park is an oasis of relaxation in the city. It offers visitors the most enjoyable recreation and disconnection modes in nature through pedestrian overpass, cycling and treadmill, alleys promenade and relaxation areas equipped with benches. You can either relax on the green areas or go by the lake and watch the swans and ducks.
Vaida Voevod Alexandru Street, number 53B, Cluj-Napoca

Adrenalin Park is the first adventure park from Cluj that offers aerial games, team buildings, parties, company events and kids theme events. With 12 adrenaline paths, the park is designed so that both children and adults can enjoy, together with nature and movement. There are 98 games, including 30 games for kids.
Monday to Friday from 12 PM to 8 PM \nSaturday and Sunday from 10 AM to 8 PM

Conveniently located just two minutes from downtown Cluj, the hotel is only a 10-minute drive from Cluj-Napoca International Airport and within walking distance of businesses centers including The Office, Maestro, Power, Silver and Julius Business Centers.

Located only a few minutes away from downtown Cluj-Napoca, the hotel tends to impress with its superb urban view. Close to shopping malls, business centers and recreation areas, it is the perfect choice for leisure or business travel.

Located just 5 minutes from the old town center and at only 20 minutes from International Airport of Cluj-Napoca. It is the ideal place to taste the delightful charm of Transylvania, while benefiting from high class service throughout the stay.

It is located 5 minutes walk from the business, tourist and historical center of Cluj-Napoca. Ramada Hotel is the perfect option, both for business and leisure purposes. It has an entire executive floor with access to Executive Lounge facilities and panoramic terraces.

The hotel is situated in the central area of ​​ Cluj-Napoca, on the Cetatuie hill. Its location offers its guests a great panorama and access to a lot of important tourist attractions (Art Museum, St. Michael\'s Church, Banffy Palace, Matei Corvin Statue) as well as various public institutions (Cluj-Napoca City Hall, Student Culture House).

Samsara is the only specialized vegetarian and vegan restaurant in Cluj (at least until today). They offer healthy and tasty meals and drinks at their location as well as a delivery service that covers the entire city.
Ștefan Ludwig Roth Street, number 5, Cluj-Napoca
Monday to Sunday from 11 AM to 11 PM

This american restaurant makes visitors start feeling the real atmosphere that is completed by the tables and decorations inspired by great American Rock Bands, the car on top of the bar, and the real chopper from the wall. These are all part of the rock spirit that catch everybody that enters the restaurant.
Monday to Friday from 10 AM to 1 AM \nSaturday and Sunday from 12 PM to 2 AM

Embark yourself in a trip away from conventional design and discover the marvellous world of fiction. The fantastic pub, mystically protected, takes you back in time. The universe of Jules Verne, filled with fantasy and sci-fi stories pops-up.
Monday to Friday from 7:30 AM to 1 AM \nSaturday and Sunday from 12 PM to 3 AM

Located in downtown Cluj-Napoca, this restaurant is the place where architecture, design and passion for life, offer the perfect setting to demonstrate love for gastronomy and quality ingredients. Baracca is the place where life is celebrated every moment.
Monday to Sunday from 12 PM to 11 PM

It is a micro brewery with a restaurant and a roof top terrace that has a wonderful view over the city. Located in the center of the city, the restaurant is best know for its beer. Klausen Burger Beer is made in front of customers and produced only with imported raw materials.
Monday to Friday from 10 AM to 2 AM \nSaturday and Sunday from 10 AM to 3 AM

2011 marks the date of opening a craft Mini-Brewery in Cluj-Napoca, on the location of the old brewery, however in a very special format, the brewery being a place where people in Cluj-Napoca can watch how fresh beer is brewed. The craft Mini- Brewery is actually named \"Fabrica de Bere Ursus\", and the intense experience of the craft beer specialties produced in this location is being described as \"Pure, Unfiltered Art\". The location is also a restaurant, the food that is being served is complementing the local beer.
Monday to Saturday from 8 AM to 3 AM \nSunday from 8 AM to 12 AM

This restaurant has an exciting and mysterious history, having 88 years old. Even though now it is a restaurant, the place formally was a pub where people used to go and drown their bitter. The owner was a fat man who tended to cry whenever he was drinking. His suffering and misfortune was due to a local competitor, opened not very far away. The owner was known to the employees for his \"tear-concerts\". At a soda supply, a restaurant employee was talking to the distributor about the owner, mentioning that he is \"Wailing like a crying monkey\". The owner heard this and since then, he decided to change the name of the restaurant to \"Crying monkey\". Nowadays, the restaurant is trying to adapt by making not very sophisticated dishes and making available more than 140 wine labels to their customers.
Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 11 PM \nSaturday and Sunday from 9 AM to 11 PM

Having a dream location, on Canalul Morii, close to the centre of the city and the Central Park, the restaurant has an atmosphere that attracts everybody as soon as the threshold is crossed. From traditional dishes to the most sophisticated dishes, the menu is one of the strengths of the Euphoria Biergarten restaurant. Besides this, Euphoria Biergarten also hosts an impressive collection of beer mugs collected from all corners of the world and exposed inside as true museum objects.
Cardinal Iuliu Hossu Street, number 25, Cluj-Napoca
Monday to Sunday from 8 AM to 2 AM

Placed in a historical house and being surrounded by a beautiful garden, the restaurant offers a balanced and varied menu, which includes a range of products by Chef Patrizia Paglieri, a selection of good wines and quality live music. The decorative elements are inspired by the music and nightlife of a classic Scottish pub. The warm atmosphere of the restaurant and the attraction brought by the terrace bring an oasis of tranquility in the heart of the city.
Monday to Friday from 11 AM to 12 AM \nSaturday and Sunday from 12 PM to 12 AM

Privileged to have a central location, in the Central Park, Chios and Carrousel remain a symbol of Cluj-Napoca. Starting with a modern design, inspired by current trends, the restaurant is a unique place where the delightful Chios Lake panorama can be admired and the history and architectural beauty of the old Skating Pavilion can be enjoyed. Using almost exclusively locally sourced ingredients, Carrousel proposes a unique and novel fusion menu, in which the Chefs creatively combine the strong traditional romanian cuisine roots with the refined elements of french cuisine and the mediterranean accents of italian cuisine in a blend that delivers authentic, quality dishes.
Monday to Sunday from 12 PM to 12 AM

Located in the center of the city, Coffee Addicts is the place where coffee lovers and addicts are understood and always welcome. Whether you want to recharge your batteries or just enjoy a good cup of coffee, the baristas are happy to guide each and every customer to the perfect combination of flavours.
Monday to Friday from 7:30 AM to 6:30 PM \nSaturday and Sunday from 10 AM to 3 PM

Q Caffe is a bohemian café in the heart of Cluj, with good music and a friendly ambience in a magical setting. Q Caffe is a place with a special story about people being one of the oldest and most popular cafes in Cluj, opened for 10 years.
Monday to Sunday from 7:30 AM to 3 AM

The coffee shop starts preparing the coffee from an espresso and according to the state and the desire of the customers, the baristas make magic and personalize the coffee. Believing in the concept that \"a good day is known since it starts\", the coffee shop owners think that the perfect day is accompanied by the coffee each person likes. Coffee stimulates, raises our motivation and the processing of information. Being present since 2010, it has 8 locations across Cluj-Napoca and Iași, and is known for the friendliness of baristas.
Monday to Friday from 7 AM to 6 PM \nSaturday from 10 AM to 3 PM

It is a coffee chain which seeks to democratize true, balanced coffee. At Narcoffee, everything revolves around coffee, black or with milk, served in the place or to go. The focus is on specialized coffee, with no syrups or other artificial flavours. Bringing coffee from different corners of the world, they fry it locally, and then serve it freshly ground to those curious to taste more.
Monday to Friday from 7:30 AM to 6 PM \nSaturday and Sunday from 9 AM to 8 PM

The coffee shop that makes you PHIL good. Sometimes, the only thing needed in the morning is a delicious coffee and a fresh croissant. The coffee shop offers the perfect environment to start the day, have business meetings, enjoy the lunch break or have a glass of wine after work. The smell of coffee and the friendly ambience will make every customer come back for more.
Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 6 PM
